Package org.croudtrip.api.trips

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JoinTripRequest
    A pending / accepting request from a passenger to join a trip.
    JoinTripRequest.Builder  
    JoinTripRequestUpdate
    Confirms or declines a JoinTripRequest,
    RunningTripQuery
    A trip query that is running on the server ("background search").
    SuperJoinTripRequest
    A collection of JoinTripRequests.
    SuperJoinTripRequest.Builder  
    SuperTripReservation
    A collection of TripReservation which together make up the reservation for a whole trip.
    SuperTripReservation.Builder  
    TripOffer
    A trip that is being offered by a driver.
    TripOffer.Builder  
    TripOfferDescription
    A description of a trip that is being offered by a driver.
    TripOfferUpdate
    Updates to a TripOffer.
    TripQuery
    A passenger query for available routes.
    TripQuery.Builder  
    TripQueryDescription
    A (price) reservation for one matched trip.
    TripQueryResult
    Contains either a list of reservations and, optionally, a query that is still running on the server to inform passengers about future trips.
    TripReservation
    A (price) reservation for one offered trip.
    UserWayPoint  
    UserWayPoint.Builder
